Please do a reaction to DayZ firearms. The game has some unconventional gun handling, for example you have to manually reload bolt action rifles and pump shotguns, you gotta load magazines, and there is some customizability. As a descendant of ArmA series, it also has long-range combat, up to several thousand meters, as well as close quarters indoors combat. It should be interesting to look at.
